snippet: Marines battled mud and more rain today and began assessing millions of dollars in damage to helicopters, buildings and equipment caused by a weekend of flooding.   Many roads on the 125,000-acre base were closed by flooding or mud slides and seve...
lead_paragraph: Marines battled mud and more rain today and began assessing millions of dollars in damage to helicopters, buildings and equipment caused by a weekend of flooding. Many roads on the 125,000-acre base were closed by flooding or mud slides and several bridges were washed out, said Master Sgt. John Farrell. He said hundreds of acres were flooded.

headline.main: Flooding in California Damages Marine Base
